tasks.task: Preparing the garden for spring planting
subtasks: Turn the soil using a tractor and disc/plow
Check soil moisture and avoid working wet soil
Allow time for herbicide effects before planting
Correct soil pH based on test results
Test soil fertility and adjust nutrients as needed
